00041 #include <stdio.h>
00042 #include <string.h>
00043 #include "memvirtu.h"
00044 #include "lowparam.h"
00045 #include "lowmacro.h"
00046 #include "lowsolid.h"
00047 #include "eulerops.h"
00048 #include "lowgeome.h"
00049 #include "vectorop.h"
00050 #include "shpshape.h"
00051 #include "splsplit.h"
00052 
00053 void MSD_lowSplitFinish(SPTYPE s, Id sn1, Id sn2, SPTYPE *Above, SPTYPE *Below)
00054 {
00055    int    i, j, cont;
00056    Id     maxd;
00057    FILE   *fv;
00058    HPTYPE he;
00059 
00060 #ifdef TRACE_SPLIT
00061    fprintf(trace, "\n\n\n");
00062    fprintf(trace, "*************************************************\n");
00063    fprintf(trace, "*                                               *\n");
00064    fprintf(trace, "*                 SETSPLITFINISH                *\n");
00065    fprintf(trace, "*                                               *\n");
00066    fprintf(trace, "*************************************************\n");
00067    fprintf(trace, "\n");
00068 #endif
00069 
00070    maxd = MSD_getMaxShellId(s);
00071 
00072    for (i = 0; i < spl_nfac; ++i)
00073    {
00074       for (j = 0; j < spl_contshell; j++)
00075       {
00076          if (SplShellShell(j) == FacFShell(SplSonf(i)))
00077          {
00078             SplShellSign(j) = -2;
00079          }
00080       }
00081       SplSonf(spl_nfac + i) = MSD_lowMSFKR(InnerLoop(SplSonf(i)), maxf++, maxd++);
00082    }
00083 
00084 #ifdef TRACE_SPLIT
00085    for (i = 0; i < 2 * spl_nfac; i++)
00086    {
00087       trace_f(SplSonf(i));
00088    }
00089 #endif
00090 
00091    for (i = 0; i < spl_nfac; ++i)
00092    {
00093       *Above = MSD_lowDetach(s, sn1, FacFShell(SplSonf(i)), -1, 0, 0);
00094       *Below = MSD_lowDetach(s, sn2, FacFShell(SplSonf(spl_nfac + i)), -1, 0, 0);
00095    }
00096 
00097    if (OutputPlanoCorte)
00098    {
00099       if ((fv = fopen(OutputFile, "w")) != (FILE *)NIL)
00100       {
00101          fprintf(fv, "numero de lacos: %d\n", spl_nfac);
00102          for (i = 0; i < spl_nfac; ++i)
00103          {
00104             he   = LooLEdg(FacFLOut(SplSonf(i)));
00105             cont = 0;
00106             do
00107             {
00108                cont++;
00109             } while ((he = HalNxt(he)) != LooLEdg(FacFLOut(SplSonf(i))));
00110             fprintf(fv, "face: %d \n", FacFaceNo(SplSonf(i)));
00111             fprintf(fv, "numero_de_vertices: %d\n", cont);
00112             he = LooLEdg(FacFLOut(SplSonf(i)));
00113             do
00114             {
00115                fprintf(fv, "vertice: %d %10.4f %10.4f %10.4f\n", VerVertexNo(HalVtx(he)),
00116                        VerVCoord(HalVtx(he))[0],
00117                        VerVCoord(HalVtx(he))[1],
00118                        VerVCoord(HalVtx(he))[2]);
00119             } while ((he = HalNxt(he)) != LooLEdg(FacFLOut(SplSonf(i))));
00120          }
00121          fclose(fv);
00122       }
00123    }
00124 
00125    for (i = 0; i < spl_contshell; i++)
00126    {
00127       if (SplShellSign(i) != -2)
00128       {
00129          if (SplShellSign(i) == 1)
00130          {
00131             *Below = MSD_lowDetach(s, sn2, SplShellShell(i), -1, 0, 0);
00132          }
00133          else
00134          {
00135             *Above = MSD_lowDetach(s, sn1, SplShellShell(i), -1, 0, 0);
00136          }
00137       }
00138    }
00139 }
